name: Karen Yankovich
what_you_do: LinkedIn strategist, business consultant, and speaker who teaches women how to build a strong network and create a strong personal brand with LinkedIn and PR marketing.
who_you_serve: Women entrepreneurs who want to build profitable careers and businesses.
social_proof: Host of the Good Girls Get Rich Podcast, over twenty years experience in information technology, marketing, and customer relationships, featured in Real 50 Over 50.
business_focus: Helping women entrepreneurs create wealth by combining smart business practices with LinkedIn and PR marketing strategies.
service_provided: LinkedIn marketing strategy, business consulting, coaching, speaking, online workshops
